attributes.action: Award the Dickens Medal to 'Diesel' The French Police Dog
attributes.background: Diesel was A Heroic French police dog the seven-year-old Belgian shepherd dog, or Malinois was killed by ISIS cowards during a major counter-terror operation in the northern Parisian suburb of Saint-Denis.

rejection.details:
We think you mean the Dickin Medal. This isn't something that the Government or Parliament has the power to award.

You can find out how to make a nomination for the Dickin Medal here:

https://www.pdsa.org.uk/what-we-do/animal-honours/the-dickin-medal
